channel.title: Node on Raúl Negrón's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Node on Raúl Negrón's Website

item.title: Server-side JavaScript, available in 6 flavors
item.description: I’ve been reading up on JavaScript these past few months. I feel like there used to be a stigma against the language during my time at university, and maybe there still is. I dug up and read a book I once bought called JavaScript: The Good Parts by Douglas Crockford. It’s outdated now, but I used to joke that if “The Good Parts” could be described in 172 pages… Well, suffice it to say, I was not very encouraged.
